front.title: HIP Extension for Flow Mobility Management

abstract.t: This document defines flow mobility extension to the Host Identity Protocol (HIP). A multi-homed HIP host makes the binding of a flow and one or more locators, through the new parameter "E-LOCATOR", which is the extension of "LOCATOR" defined in RFC5206, the host can acknowledgement his peers with addresses available that fit for some traffic flow. Peer hosts then selects the most appropriate address to transfer the traffic flow.
